Immutable record representing a single quote on a yield curve.

public record YieldCurveQuote : IEquatable<YieldCurveQuote>

object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Remarks

Instances of this record represent a single point on a yield curve; a collection of these for the same date but different maturities forms a full yield curve observation.

Constructors

YieldCurveQuote(DateTime, Maturity, double)

Immutable record representing a single quote on a yield curve.

public YieldCurveQuote(DateTime Date, Maturity Maturity, double Yield)

Parameters

Date DateTime

The date the quote was observed.

Maturity Maturity

The Maturity that identifies the term associated with this quote.

Yield double

The yield value for the specified maturity (expressed as a decimal, e.g. 0.05 for 5%).

Remarks

Instances of this record represent a single point on a yield curve; a collection of these for the same date but different maturities forms a full yield curve observation.
